homePage.title: PicGuard
homePage.description: This app will not upload any pictures to the server, all operations are completed locally
homePage.textLabelDescription: Text will be added to the image as a watermark
homePage.textInput: This certificate is only used for handling xx business, and is invalid for other purposes.

exitConfirm.title: Close confirmation
exitConfirm.description: Are you sure you want to close this window?

licenseDialog.licenseDialogContentContent: Protecting user's privacy and personal information is a fundamental principle of PicGuard.
licenseDialog.licenseDialogContentTip: Below is a list of permissions required by this APP:
licenseDialog.licenseDialogContentPrefix: Before you use this APP's services, please carefully read and agree to the
licenseDialog.licenseDialogContentSuffix: , start using our services after you agree and accept all terms.
iosPermissions: 1. For you to take photos, PicGuard needs access to your Camera. (NSCameraUsageDescription)
2. For you to upload pictures, PicGuard needs access to your Photos. (NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription)
androidPermissions: 1. In order to use the Firebase Analytics Service, PicGuard needs access to your Internet. (android.permission.INTERNET)
2. For you to upload pictures, PicGuard needs access to your Storage. (android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE)
3. For you to save pictures, PicGuard needs access to your Storage. (android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE)
4. For you to upload pictures, PicGuard needs access to your Photos. (android.permission.READ_MEDIA_IMAGES)
5. For you to take photos, PicGuard needs access to your Camera. (android.permission.CAMERA)
